title: P.C.F.H. Week: My Husband Is Withdrawing From Me
description:
Carol’s husband has become withdrawn and is communicating with an ex-girlfriend. Carol knows he’s doing this because of the arguments between them. - Dr. Laura: "How does a nice woman behave like a bitch wife?: She gets comfortable and feels secure."

What have you done to push away your man? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “The Proper Care and Feeding of Husbands”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-the-proper-care-and-feeding-of-husbands

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
